metadata.name: Shichiho [gold]
metadata.description:
七宝 [金]
金色の門出、道を照らしますように。
May the golden new departure, light the way.

七宝とは仏教における七種の宝のこと。金、銀、瑠璃、玻璃、硨磲、珊瑚、瑪瑙。
Shichiho refers to the seven treasures considered precious in Buddhism. Gold, silver, lapis lazuli, rock crystal, tridacna, coral, agate.
